title: No results when searched via Package view selection and dialog (1GLDN1X)
description: When searching for declarations via the Package view selection and dialog, no results are found. However, searching via the context menu in the packages view works correctly.
OB: The Search dialog in the package view is initialized with the fully qualified name, which is not found when searching for declarations.
EB: When searching for declarations via the Package view selection and dialog, the search should first try to get the Java element. If that fails, it should display the element name instead of the fully qualified name.
SR:
1. Open the Package view.
2. Select a package.
3. Open the search dialog.
4. Enter a declaration to search for.
5. Click on the search button.
6. Observe that no results are found.
